channel.title: How to add a full dicing system to RsCalifornia v2?
channel.description: How do I add dicing to RsCalifornia v2, I want it so when I have a dice, and click on it, it rolls it, and i want it to force talk that (Player Name) Rolled (NUMBER) On The Dice. please help

item.title: How to add a full dicing system to RsCalifornia v2?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

RsCalifornia a Project Insanity base?

Add the dice bag item ID under the switch statement in clickitem.java

Then under it add forcedChat, for example, c.forcedChat("");

use misc.random to help predict a number.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add a full dicing system to RsCalifornia v2?

item.title: How to add a full dicing system to RsCalifornia v2?

item.description:
@PvP_Bobby wrote:

A system for Dice is already implemented. Actually look through all the code lol.
